```{r setup}
library(ussie)
library(dplyr)
```
ussie let's you build european football data from the engsoccerdata package by making standard tibbles for each country

```{r}
spain <- uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::spain,"Spain")
glimpse(spain)
```

## Get country data

```{r}
uss_get_matches("italy") |>
  glimpse()
```
